db.description:
• Answer telephone inquiries promptly and professionally and channel to appropriate person for assistance.
• Greet members and Guests in a friendly and efficient manner.
• Knowledgeable about all aspects of treatments and the facility. Respond to inquiries by phone and in person, providing complete details of all spa aspects
• Collect moneys or other suitable payment from guests for all services rendered - operate point of sale system
• Treatment bookings/scheduling.
• Ensure the facility is in peak condition at all times (operations and cleanliness).
• Ensure Guest/Member satisfaction at all times by ensuring that safety and service is always the spa's first priority.
• Carry out any other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
db.requirement:
• Experience working in a Beauty, Hospitality, Health & Fitness, Hotel, Spa environment. Is highly desirable.
• Outstanding communication skills, both written & verbal.
• Enthusiastic and positive personality with the ability to build trusting relationships with others.
• Communicating in English 
• Able to work shifts.
• Working location: Diamond Island, No 01 - Street No.104-BTT, Quarter 3, Binh Trung Tay Ward, Dist. 2, HCMC
db.benefit:
• Competitive Salary 
• Training on job 
• Professional working environment
